<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="46485" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="46485" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.27</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="284">284</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="39"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Monsieur Beauregard</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. <b>Monsieur Beauregard</b> was launched in 2017. Top notes are Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Orris Root, Benzoin and Cinnamon; base notes are Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Patchouli. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="46485"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96374447969832; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 3.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90728327058369; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 3.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div></div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2280524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280524" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SweetBriar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1018716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SweetBriar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716">SweetBriar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very masculine in my opinion and not very sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="2280524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=2280524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-14">08/14/23 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is delightfully gourmand. The pink pepper is blended well with the creamy tonka, cinnamon, and orris to create almost a chocolate accord, so I think this smells similar to another favourite of mine, Jazzy Twist by Valmont which has chocolate, magnolia, and tuberose. Sadly for my wallet, I began a hobby of collecting discontinued Penhaligon's perfumes partly for the bottle itself so this made my way into my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1902197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1902197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1671066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1671066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingerFD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1540883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingerFD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1671066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1671066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883">KingerFD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-21">10/21/22 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A light lemon smell hovering over a sandalwood base that almost has a slight coconut vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1671066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1671066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1508275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1508275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="inkhorus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1450900.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="inkhorus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Narjis-70382.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70382.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narjis"title="Narjis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1508275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1508275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450900">inkhorus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-20">02/20/22 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All is nice until you notice that the fragrance performance does not match how stunning its packaging is. Rather nice smell: sweet, spicy, cinnamony but quite subtle and does not last long. Such a shame, but hey, if you can afford to respray it might be a good match for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1508275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1508275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1442097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ruzaick Rushan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1219903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ruzaick Rushan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1442097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1442097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219903">Ruzaick Rushan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-08">11/08/21 00:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Before I start  my review  would love to ask a small question. Does anyone of you have come  across any perfume that gives away that purple  feel that Monsieur  Beauregard  gives ?  If so please let me know. <br />
<br />
" MY BOTTLE OF FINE WINE " that's what comes to my mind when I sniff it. This is my first niche and my nose is not well trained to pick up the notes. For me, it's a sweet scent and not that spicy which it claims to be. And when I say sweet it's not a sugary kind of a sweet. It's such a beautiful sweetness that doesn't become overwhelming at any point in its journey. <br />
<br />
It has such a beautiful opening which is my favourite part of the story. This opening is so purplish. Somewhat feminine yet so beautiful. Then in the mid notes, it becomes a bit spicy but not overwhelming at all. And then it again becomes a bit sweeter with a beautiful purplish feel. This time bit lighter than the opening. <br />
<br />
For me, it feels like a walk in a French Vineyard. And it makes me get dwelled in a beautiful dark purplish emotion. And definitely, the ingredients are of the highest quality, so clean and fine. So beautiful. <br />
<br />
I think it's versatile and in my opinion definitely unisex. <br />
<br />
Given its retail price, its longevity and the sillage is a letdown. But I'm fine with that as I expect to wear it for myself when I wanna live in the emotion that it gives. Some would say that it's such a short journey and it doesn't worth it. But some short journeys are way more worthy than the long rides. <br />
<br />
So yeah I love MY BOTTLE OF FINE WINE. <br />
<br />
And to add to that it has definitely got a fantastic presentation with a gorgeous box and a very beautiful bottle design for which I love very much. And the beautiful juice colour adds on to that. So with all those together it's a beautiful piece of art. Maybe not for all but for me, it's a masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1442097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1442097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1364099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1364099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1364099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1364099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-22">06/22/21 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First of all, I love the bottle with its rooster head and the packaging, in general, is gorgeous for the portraits range. I would consider this unisex, on the masculine side but as a female, I have no issues with wearing this. Cinnamon and peppery. I don't get any lemon, more like cinnamon cakes. I got this and Cousin Matthew free in the portraits game because I liked the sound of them more than the female scents on offer. I'm pleased with my choice but not sure this is worth 204. It feels expensive with the heavy bottle and the packaging and feels good quality but for the scent itself in the bottle it doesn't feel like the price is quite justified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1364099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1364099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1358351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1358351" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nick68"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nick68" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Habit-Rouge-Rouge-Prive-80690.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80690.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Habit Rouge Rouge Priv"title="Habit Rouge Rouge Priv"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1358351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1358351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257270">Nick68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-11">06/11/21 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it to a point. <br />
<br />
Straight off I get a wonderful hit of cinnamon and pepper, not picking up the lemon at all. I love cinnamon! <br />
<br />
Its really quite something for the first few hours you wear it but unfortunately it fades rather  quickly after that. <br />
<br />
A fantastic fragrance let down by its performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1358351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1358351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354651" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Traceur Nath"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Traceur Nath" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347290">Traceur Nath</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 16:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is beautifully blended and constructed. I'm fairly new to fragrances but this is the first one that has me kinda enamoured and intrigued. The lemon and pepper in the opening is really something. <br />
<br />
For sure unisex, and I'd say pretty versatile, but it's definitely a bit grown up and sophisticated, and because of the poor performance as detailed below, it's probably more of a fragrance for the person wearing it to enjoy and appreciate, I'd say it's unlikely to get you noticed a great deal. <br />
<br />
So performance-wise, I get around 2 hours of moderate-minor projection, possibly a little bit more, And after that it's a skin scent for a few hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is outstanding! This is however nothing like Valentino Noir Absolu. I would say this is a more mature and more subtle version of MM Replica Jazz Club which I also own. Got the bottle for free after taking part in Penhaligon's promo. I am in love with this. I would say this is more suited for night time wear but can also be worn during the day time in the cooler months. <br />
<br />
My overall rating: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1353731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1353731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1337622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1337622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Guardian-of-The-Forest-62542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guardian of The Forest"title="Guardian of The Forest"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1337622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1337622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5564">Tee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-04">05/04/21 22:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>clean, warm and familiar. <br />
<br />
i thought i wont enjoy it when i sniffed the opening of lemon and spice (pink pepper?) . then powdery familiar iris and warm sandalwood appears. i'm unsure about the cinnamon, since I'm not crazy about cinnamon fragrances. finally... the dry down is creamy sweetish tonka sandalwood! i love sandalwood and i love this drydown... combined with little patchouli, i can sniff something almost white chocolatey... but not chocolate... <br />
<br />
i love how this fragrance evolve during my wear, just i'm not feeling the cinnamon...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1337622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1337622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993871">ehsankasiri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-10">04/10/21 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>            .      <br />
-----------<br />
Scent &amp; Quality: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10<br />
Creativity &amp; Uniqueness: 6/10<br />
Affordability: 2/10<br />
-----------<br />
Overall: 6.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1322966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1322966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1307451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1307451" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jarrid_steel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242708"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242708.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jarrid_steel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1307451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1307451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242708">jarrid_steel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-13">03/13/21 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first Penhaligon's fragrance I'm sampling and chose it as my scent of the day. <br />
<br />
It smells beautiful. A very well blended, spicy sandalwood and orris fragrance. The benzoin and tonka provide an ambery sweetness in the dry down. Very pleasant. Very warm and cozy. Completely unisex. Versatile. <br />
<br />
My only gripe is that the performance isn't stellar. I wish it lasted longer, projected farther but I only had 0.7 ml and didn't use it all, so it would probably do better with more sprays. <br />
<br />
To my nose, this smells very similar to Caban by YSL which I love but this one is smoother and better blended. Caban lasts a lot longer on my skin but the scent of this one is just better, in my opinion. They're not exactly the same but very close because the sandalwood in both fragrances is a main player and they use it in much the same way. <br />
<br />
Scent : 10/10 <br />
Longevity : 7/10 (might be my fault. I'll sample again in the future to edit this review if needed)<br />
Projection : 6.5/10<br />
Sillage : 6/10<br />
Overall : 8/10<br />
<br />
Final thoughts ... <br />
This could be a hit if the price were more affordable and if it lasted a lot longer than it did on my skin. For the price, I expect a lot more bang for my buck. If smell were everything, it'd get a 10/10 because I absolutely love the way it smells. Definitely going to sample this again and test it some more because it smells THAT good to my nose even if the performance seems to be lacking real power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1307451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1307451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1242492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1242492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bdragonfly12345"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1227547.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bdragonfly12345" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1242492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1242492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227547">bdragonfly12345</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-28">10/28/20 21:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I totally agree with @Manuscoronum's review. <br />
<br />
This is my first Penhaligon's scent (one of the niche samples I purchased), and I too thought it was delightfully akin to 'Bengal Spice' tea when I first sprayed it, and the sandalwood + benzoin kept me going back for a sniff. [I definitely do NOT smell white chocolate, like the previous reviewer!]<br />
<br />
It projected nicely for a couple of hours, but then (alas!) became a skin scent. A very pleasant skin scent, but a bit 'weak' for what I would expect from this price range. <br />
<br />
It's another scent that I would happily wear, but not purchase for myself. I definitely found it a fragrance any gender could easily enjoy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1242492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1242492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1223418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1223418" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ramin20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ramin20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1223418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1223418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249265">ramin20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-12">09/12/20 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>white chocolate in a bottle<br />
<br />
beautiful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1223418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1223418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1215929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1215929" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumemory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/93104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.93104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumemory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Tragedy-of-Lord-George-40716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Tragedy of Lord George"title="The Tragedy of Lord George"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1215929ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1215929" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/93104">perfumemory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-25">08/25/20 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is fantastic, just what I was getting from the sample I had gotten earlier. The biggest issue is, it is not long-lasting at all, especially given it's marked and marketed as Perfume, not Eau de toilette or Eau fraiche. I am not anosmic. I use many other fragrances, and most of them stay for hours - as for example Penhaligon's Halfeti. I got my bottle a little cheaper than retail price from FragranceX who have quite a good reputation, so I have very little doubt I got authentic fragrance.<br />
The fragrance I got becoming skin scent in 2.5 hours at best if not earlier (when I am not sweating, just staying home mostly with air conditioner on), after I spray quite generously. As much as I like the fragrance, its low performance is disappointing, especially at this price point. Would I recommend this fragrance? - well, yes and no. Yes  if you don't mind carrying the bottle with you and respraying generously every couple of hours. It is a very high class fragrance, very nicely composed. No  if money is an object, and if you are expecting higher performance from $200++ 75ml of perfume. Judge for yourself.<br />
----<br />
REVISED 7 months later: I am absolutely in love with this frag. Yes, it has weak longevity, yes, it's overpriced, but the scent simply lifts me up and gives me strength to go through the morning. Considering it a business expense now :))) (jk, but seriously... it's the best barbershop scent, also among a few others from Penhaligon's that I have tried).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1215929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1215929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1207529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1098649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1098649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1090992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1090992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manuscoronum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manuscoronum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1090992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1090992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633">Manuscoronum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-24">08/24/19 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I had the extra cash I would have bought this fro Penhaligon's in Edinburgh immediately. Luckily they gave me a sample and I am glad I didn't buy a bottle.<br />
<br />
The note opens with cinnamon and lemon, immediately reminding me of Bengal spiced tea. The warmth is inviting and seductive.<br />
<br />
The heart notes of sandalwood and benzoin make this fragrance a delight to keep sniffing and your hand is to your nose quite consistently. <br />
<br />
Tragically this fragrance becomes a skin scent after a couple of hours. I feel their aren't enough fixatives in it or more deep base notes even though it is considered balsamic.<br />
<br />
Delightful scent overall! Would love a bottle, bot not worth the price tag for the short endurance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1090992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1090992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1087542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1087542" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Peto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Peto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Argos/Danae-75590.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75590.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dana"title="Dana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1087542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1087542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144538">Peto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-13">08/13/19 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excellent Fragrance with similarities to VU but this one is a lot more refined with outstanding performance!! Perfect for fall/winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1087542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1087542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1086642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1086642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Birnam_Wood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1061235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Birnam_Wood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1086642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1086642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061235">Birnam_Wood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-10">08/10/19 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Fords Santal Blush is thoroughly bewitching, and here comes the...what can I say, slightly man-ized version of it.<br />
<br />
It has a functional citrus top: smooth and pleasant, with hint of sweet orange, and a hidden layer of black peppery (nothing pink about it), serve to make people think this is a mans cologne.<br />
<br />
Then it starts to slide into that ambiguous golden fuzzy vibe of Santal Blush. During the transition stage, there is a dash of slightly brighter notes (leftover citrus? A facet of Benzoin?) make it a bit different.<br />
<br />
Then comes a elusive accord that I've been chasing from one perfume to another, yet still failed to trap it with words.<br />
<br />
It feels rosy but 10 miles away from a typical rose flower; it shares features with the softest patchouli, and something in tobacco reminds me of preserved dry plum (); it's mellow, every hard edges have been rounded off;  as I said, its an enveloping fuzzy gold aura.<br />
<br />
The base of TF Santal blush is loaded with it, I also found similar vibe in Aesthete by Le Galion, Alizarin by Penhaligons, Palissandr d'Or by Aedes; most recent encounter is Dojima by Mona di Orio, oh Jesus fucking Christ, this one is good.<br />
<br />
Is it some type of patchouli? a facet of artificial oud? a certain tobacco component? All of the above, also rounded by soft Tonka and orris butter? <br />
<br />
Now I start to suspect its a not-cheap-enough specialty base by some big name company, Or it's just an imaginative note made up by my head?<br />
<br />
Its one of the only two accords which spells sexy to me. One in thousand of guy, perhaps someone like Jacques de Bascher, can pull it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1086642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1086642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1075746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1075746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy the Frenchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy the Frenchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1075746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1075746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781">Andy the Frenchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-04">07/04/19 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very sweet, heavy, nearly cloying fragrance, probably designed more for the american market than the european one. Despite its name, I can imagine more a woman wearing that. Hard pass for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1075746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1075746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1074516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1074516" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SebWB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176801"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1176801.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SebWB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1074516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1074516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); If so message me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1074516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1074516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1073545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1073545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaLuNaveed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1188088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaLuNaveed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Via-Cavour-I-47871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Via Cavour I"title="Via Cavour I"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1073545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1073545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188088">LaLuNaveed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-26">06/26/19 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this for my boyfriend. I looked at the notes and it had everything that a great man's fragrance needs; freshness of lemon, warmth of cinnamon and benzoin, sweetness of Tonka, creaminess of sandalwood, some spice from pepper, a bit of cuddliness from Orris root, finished with muskiness of patchouli... Perfection. <br />
Ok, I bought this for the bottle... We are proud owners of a heard of chickens and this one rooster named Roy is his favorite guy, so I thought he would get a kick out of the cap. Yes, he loves the rooster cap and he looooves the fragrance even more. It's very warm and fresh, yet masculine. I appreciate when a great juice comes in a cool bottle. You won't smell like everyone else... It truly is perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1073545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1073545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1071655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1071655" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bon-Parfumeur/602-pepper-cedar-patchouli-51010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="602 pepper, cedar, patchouli "title="602 pepper, cedar, patchouli "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1071655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1071655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197623">cpez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-20">06/20/19 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very sexy.<br />
<br />
Definitely one for a date or to wear with a loved one.<br />
<br />
Pretty pricey, but you wont regret this one.<br />
<br />
On the sweet side, and intense florals on first application. The drydown after an hour is magical.<br />
<br />
The long term dry down is soft, sweet and sandlewood.<br />
<br />
Masterful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1071655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1071655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1061487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1061487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clintjr82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/600617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.600617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="clintjr82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bottega-Veneta/Parco-Palladiano-V-Lauro-38267.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38267.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Parco Palladiano V: Lauro"title="Parco Palladiano V: Lauro"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1061487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1061487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/600617">clintjr82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-17">05/17/19 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Snmells like money and luxury. Addictive.  I bought me a bottle after all the good response. This is blended good. A nicely done one. I thought Prada l homme and infusion were the best powdery scents for men. This is miles of head of the typical Prada infusion/powdery scents. Its worth a try or buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1061487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1061487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1024452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1024452" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scotchegg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1160639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scotchegg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Musc-Immortel-41971.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41971.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Immortel"title="Musc Immortel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1024452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1024452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160639">scotchegg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-25">01/25/19 19:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells, to me, like an incredibly expensive version of Valentino Uomo. It's not exactly similar, but it definitely feels in the same ballpark with the lemon opening that transitions into a smooth, buttery, pastry-like fragrance. The big difference between the two for me is the obvious huge leap in quality from MB, it just smells so deep, rich and frankly, like money. <br />
<br />
The opening of MB is really top-tier, it's a beautiful lemon, peppery vibe with a touch of the sweetness to come and it's really special. Once the opening lifts away, the orris comes through, thick and luxurious, giving the whole thing a very smooth velvety feeling. It's a very classic touch, but at the same time, MB remains completely modern. I think it would be a bit of a crowd pleaser, my only hesitation being that it is really very heavy. This is another of the main differences between this and Uomo; whereas Uomo is light and a fairly close scent that's easy to wear, MB is heavy and dense and you need to be careful not to overspray or wear in a closed environment in my opinion, it could get cloying and oppressive real quick.<br />
<br />
Overall I'd say the pyramid is fairly true to what you get, except the patchouli, I didn't notice any patchouli at all, even in the late dry down so it must be soft in there. speaking of the dry down, it lasts forever. On me I sprayed it at 10 am this morning, it's now 3:30 am and I'm about to jump in the shower and I can still smell it as strong as I could at lunchtime. Absolute monster.<br />
<br />
Classic and very beautiful with a heavy modern edge, it's a beautiful fragrance. The bottle and juice colour is just as fantastic. MB is really a great scent, suited to the colder months, possibly needs to be dressed up to do it justice. I'm not sure it's a love for me, purely based on the fact it feels a little bit showy, but that's just a personal preference and objectively speaking, I think it's a very beautiful scent. Worth the price over Uomo? Not for me personally, I actually prefer Uomo as it's lighter and easier to wear, but there's no mistaking that this is a far superior fragrance as far as pure quality goes. Very nice effort from Penhaligon's and difficult to truly fault honestly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1024452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1024452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1015050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1015050" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshmallowmarsupial"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/162882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshmallowmarsupial" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1015050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1015050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/162882">Marshmallowmarsupial</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-30">12/30/18 17:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had to scrub this off because it immediately gave me an asthma attack. Cedar isnt listed among the notes, but judging by my reaction, Im pretty certain its in there. Frustrating because at first sniff it seemed like something I would enjoy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1015050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1015050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent997356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc997356" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="echo4kilo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="echo4kilo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Room-237-30364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Room 237"title="Room 237"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma997356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd997356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785">echo4kilo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-03">11/03/18 18:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a sample from Lucky Scent. Monsieur Beauregard has a very soft sweet smell. I almost want to call it delicious. The sandalwood, orris, and benzoin gives it a sophisticated feel. It is masculine and another example of why Penhaligon's is one of my favorite fragrance brands. I just wish a bottle was a little less expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="997356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=997356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent988245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
