If anyone is interested in a swap please message me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="988245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=988245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent973118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc973118" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oslo-fjord"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.52140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oslo-fjord" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit"title="Fahrenheit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma973118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd973118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52140">Oslo-fjord</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-19">08/19/18 04:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sophisticated and soft. A very versatile scent that could be great as a signature scent. It's absolutely stunning with the soft, balsamic spicy notes. Even the fragrance is quite "soft", the sillage and stayingpower is surprisingly good!A very nice fragrance from Penhaligon's. One of the best from the Portraits line, close to Sohan and Radcliff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="973118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=973118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent957598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc957598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spumyland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.189882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spumyland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maher-Olfactive/Santal-Auster-60618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Auster"title="Santal Auster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma957598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd957598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-01">07/01/18 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>About me this is a sensual powder, sweet,  a bit feminine, thick and spicy. The opening I have memories of strawberries, coconut and lemon as in sunscreens, but this is like velvet.A velvet sofa. <br />
The smell is simple and comfortable and on my arm remained little and close to the skin. <br />
In two words: super-soft <br />
In one: sofa<br />
<br />
Package:10/10<br />
The bottles of this line in addition to being beautiful are also practical. They have a longer and vaporized fine spray for a perfect application.Type of movement when you put hairspray!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="957598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=957598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-04">05/04/18 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The sandalwood along with benzoin are comforting, soothing and relaxing. This kin of warm sandalwood/oud/amber scents are what I would wear after bath and before going to bed. It makes me feel safe, peaceful and relaxed just like when I am hugging by my mum.<br />
<br />
The scent is unisex. It creates a warm woody/balsamic aroma with sandalwood and benzoin, and adds cleaness to it by orris root and patchouli, while at the same time bestows a hint of spiciness with pink pepper and cinnamon. Last but not least, the note of tonka bean makes it addictive that I couldn't help but kept smelling it on the test paper and my arm. Nonetheless I cannot smell the lemon note no matter at the first sniff (as it is one of the top notes) or when it dries down, on the test paper or on my arm. Maybe my nose is comparably not so sensitive to lemon scent.<br />
<br />
I love it so much and it has a good longevity as I could still smell it after 7 hours I sprayed it on my arm in store. It would be more affordable and I would definitely buy one if its price is cheaper though I understand more money, better quality either in terms of ingredients or formula.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc870332" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Q80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/698615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.698615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Q80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma870332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd870332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); Like a cologne but with a twisted cinnamon, tonka, and lemon blend that gives the whole juice a fair change to the typical original cologne.<br />
<br />
Hmm... Well.. it's not really a meh, but i'd go for meh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="870332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=870332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent867954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc867954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gphelan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081058"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1081058.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gphelan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Encre-Noire-1834.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1834.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encre Noire"title="Encre Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma867954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd867954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081058">Gphelan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-05">10/05/17 20:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Truly beautiful scent. Peppery sandalwood with a hint of brightness. Very sophisticated and handsome but I'd wear it in a flash; nothing cloying about the sandalwood aspect. Cinnamon sits below the sandalwood. I wish it were a bit more affordable!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="867954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=867954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent856340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc856340" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jude1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/981239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.981239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jude1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Timbuktu-1267.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1267.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Timbuktu"title="Timbuktu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma856340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd856340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/981239">Jude1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-31">08/31/17 04:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favourite of the Portraits range. Beautiful powdery/earthy composition. Slightly branded towards men but definitely unisex. The orris and tonka notes are reminiscent of luxurious setting powders you'd find on your mother's dressing table.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="856340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=856340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1024452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1024452" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scotchegg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1160639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scotchegg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Musc-Immortel-41971.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41971.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Immortel"title="Musc Immortel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1024452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1024452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160639">scotchegg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-25">01/25/19 19:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells, to me, like an incredibly expensive version of Valentino Uomo. It's not exactly similar, but it definitely feels in the same ballpark with the lemon opening that transitions into a smooth, buttery, pastry-like fragrance. The big difference between the two for me is the obvious huge leap in quality from MB, it just smells so deep, rich and frankly, like money. <br />
<br />
The opening of MB is really top-tier, it's a beautiful lemon, peppery vibe with a touch of the sweetness to come and it's really special. Once the opening lifts away, the orris comes through, thick and luxurious, giving the whole thing a very smooth velvety feeling. It's a very classic touch, but at the same time, MB remains completely modern. I think it would be a bit of a crowd pleaser, my only hesitation being that it is really very heavy. This is another of the main differences between this and Uomo; whereas Uomo is light and a fairly close scent that's easy to wear, MB is heavy and dense and you need to be careful not to overspray or wear in a closed environment in my opinion, it could get cloying and oppressive real quick.<br />
<br />
Overall I'd say the pyramid is fairly true to what you get, except the patchouli, I didn't notice any patchouli at all, even in the late dry down so it must be soft in there. speaking of the dry down, it lasts forever. On me I sprayed it at 10 am this morning, it's now 3:30 am and I'm about to jump in the shower and I can still smell it as strong as I could at lunchtime. Absolute monster.<br />
<br />
Classic and very beautiful with a heavy modern edge, it's a beautiful fragrance. The bottle and juice colour is just as fantastic. MB is really a great scent, suited to the colder months, possibly needs to be dressed up to do it justice. I'm not sure it's a love for me, purely based on the fact it feels a little bit showy, but that's just a personal preference and objectively speaking, I think it's a very beautiful scent. Worth the price over Uomo? Not for me personally, I actually prefer Uomo as it's lighter and easier to wear, but there's no mistaking that this is a far superior fragrance as far as pure quality goes. Very nice effort from Penhaligon's and difficult to truly fault honestly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1024452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1024452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1242492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1242492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bdragonfly12345"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1227547.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bdragonfly12345" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1242492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1242492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227547">bdragonfly12345</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-28">10/28/20 21:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I totally agree with @Manuscoronum's review. <br />
<br />
This is my first Penhaligon's scent (one of the niche samples I purchased), and I too thought it was delightfully akin to 'Bengal Spice' tea when I first sprayed it, and the sandalwood + benzoin kept me going back for a sniff. [I definitely do NOT smell white chocolate, like the previous reviewer!]<br />
<br />
It projected nicely for a couple of hours, but then (alas!) became a skin scent. A very pleasant skin scent, but a bit 'weak' for what I would expect from this price range. <br />
<br />
It's another scent that I would happily wear, but not purchase for myself. I definitely found it a fragrance any gender could easily enjoy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1242492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1242492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume Beginners"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume Beginners" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ta-if-4922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ta'if"title="Ta'if"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092780">Perfume Beginners</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-04">05/04/18 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The sandalwood along with benzoin are comforting, soothing and relaxing. This kin of warm sandalwood/oud/amber scents are what I would wear after bath and before going to bed. It makes me feel safe, peaceful and relaxed just like when I am hugging by my mum.<br />
<br />
The scent is unisex. It creates a warm woody/balsamic aroma with sandalwood and benzoin, and adds cleaness to it by orris root and patchouli, while at the same time bestows a hint of spiciness with pink pepper and cinnamon. Last but not least, the note of tonka bean makes it addictive that I couldn't help but kept smelling it on the test paper and my arm. Nonetheless I cannot smell the lemon note no matter at the first sniff (as it is one of the top notes) or when it dries down, on the test paper or on my arm. Maybe my nose is comparably not so sensitive to lemon scent.<br />
<br />
I love it so much and it has a good longevity as I could still smell it after 7 hours I sprayed it on my arm in store. It would be more affordable and I would definitely buy one if its price is cheaper though I understand more money, better quality either in terms of ingredients or formula.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="939481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=939481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1073545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1073545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaLuNaveed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1188088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaLuNaveed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Via-Cavour-I-47871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Via Cavour I"title="Via Cavour I"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1073545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1073545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188088">LaLuNaveed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-26">06/26/19 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this for my boyfriend. I looked at the notes and it had everything that a great man's fragrance needs; freshness of lemon, warmth of cinnamon and benzoin, sweetness of Tonka, creaminess of sandalwood, some spice from pepper, a bit of cuddliness from Orris root, finished with muskiness of patchouli... Perfection. <br />
Ok, I bought this for the bottle... We are proud owners of a heard of chickens and this one rooster named Roy is his favorite guy, so I thought he would get a kick out of the cap. Yes, he loves the rooster cap and he looooves the fragrance even more. It's very warm and fresh, yet masculine. I appreciate when a great juice comes in a cool bottle. You won't smell like everyone else... It truly is perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1073545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1073545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent856340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc856340" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jude1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/981239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.981239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jude1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Timbuktu-1267.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1267.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Timbuktu"title="Timbuktu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma856340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd856340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); The orris and tonka notes are reminiscent of luxurious setting powders you'd find on your mother's dressing table.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="856340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=856340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46485" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1075746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1075746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy the Frenchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy the Frenchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1075746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1075746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781">Andy the Frenchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-04">07/04/19 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very sweet, heavy, nearly cloying fragrance, probably designed more for the american market than the european one. Despite its name, I can imagine more a woman wearing that. Hard pass for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1075746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1075746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1086642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1086642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Birnam_Wood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1061235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Birnam_Wood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1086642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1086642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061235">Birnam_Wood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-10">08/10/19 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Fords Santal Blush is thoroughly bewitching, and here comes the...what can I say, slightly man-ized version of it.<br />
<br />
It has a functional citrus top: smooth and pleasant, with hint of sweet orange, and a hidden layer of black peppery (nothing pink about it), serve to make people think this is a mans cologne.<br />
<br />
Then it starts to slide into that ambiguous golden fuzzy vibe of Santal Blush. During the transition stage, there is a dash of slightly brighter notes (leftover citrus? A facet of Benzoin?) make it a bit different.<br />
<br />
Then comes a elusive accord that I've been chasing from one perfume to another, yet still failed to trap it with words.<br />
<br />
It feels rosy but 10 miles away from a typical rose flower; it shares features with the softest patchouli, and something in tobacco reminds me of preserved dry plum (); it's mellow, every hard edges have been rounded off;  as I said, its an enveloping fuzzy gold aura.<br />
<br />
The base of TF Santal blush is loaded with it, I also found similar vibe in Aesthete by Le Galion, Alizarin by Penhaligons, Palissandr d'Or by Aedes; most recent encounter is Dojima by Mona di Orio, oh Jesus fucking Christ, this one is good.<br />
<br />
Is it some type of patchouli? a facet of artificial oud? a certain tobacco component? All of the above, also rounded by soft Tonka and orris butter? <br />
<br />
Now I start to suspect its a not-cheap-enough specialty base by some big name company, Or it's just an imaginative note made up by my head?<br />
<br />
Its one of the only two accords which spells sexy to me. One in thousand of guy, perhaps someone like Jacques de Bascher, can pull it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1086642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1086642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280524" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SweetBriar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1018716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SweetBriar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018716">SweetBriar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very masculine in my opinion and not very sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="2280524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=2280524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1098649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1098649" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohsen95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohsen95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1098649ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1098649" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817">mohsen95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-17">09/17/19 23:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="46485"comment_id="1098649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Monsieur-Beauregard-46485.html?ccid=1098649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="46485" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
